entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
